name: HIGHRUNNER - Alpha
description:
HIGHRUNNER is a parkour speedrunning game, set on the rooftops of a stylized city. In the complex environments you have to find the best path to make it through the levels as quick as possible.

  • Make your way through the complex levels
  • Enjoy the simple but beautiful graphics and atmosphere
  • Compare yourself to the others using the ingame leaderboard
  • Run above the clouds and make it to the top
